title: A systematic review and meta-analysis on prevalence of gastrointestinal helminthic infections in rodents of Iran: An emphasis on zoonotic aspects
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Yazdan Hamzavi, Mohammad Taghi Khodayari, Afshin Davari, Mohammad Reza Shiee, Seyed Ahmad Karamati, Saber Raeghi, Hadis Jabarmanesh, Helia Bashiri, Arezoo Bozorgomid
